      • getRenderedStartview

        public static javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> getRenderedStartview(int playerIndex,
                                                                                   javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> datalist,
                                                                                   double avgListviewWidth)
        This method renders world map information in startview. Country information will be colored by its owner color if player number is confirmed
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - player's index number
        datalist - an ObservableList from a ListView UI control
        avgListviewWidth - allowed width of this ListView UI control
        Returns:
        a new rendered ListView for display in worldmap or player's information HBox pane
